result.title: Invitation to NOVICE — The Programming Challenge
result.content:
Invitation to TECHELON'16 presents NOVICE

'NOVICE' The Online Programming challenge, is being conducted by Techelon under Innovision'16, The Techno-Managerial fest of Netaji Subhas Institute Of Technology, Delhi. The 24 hour Mega coding event goes live on 8th March 9:00 PM.

To be a part of the constest register on the Hackerrank now! Contest Link

PRIZES

1st prize — Rs 9,000/-

2nd prize — Rs 6,000/-

3rd prize — Rs 3,000/-

For more details , visit the Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/events/483273951858957/

Spread the word among your friends who are interested .

Hope to see you participating.

Happy Coding!
